options_introduction.message: Drag & drop the languages you want to show up in the "translate" menu from the "Languages" to the "Selected languages" list (You can sort your languages inside the "Selected languages" menu and changes will be reflected in context menu). If you want to remove a language from menu, just drop it back into "Languages". Don't forget to press "Save settings" in the right-top corner. :)
